basic.name: Construction Worker
basic.description: Working in the construction sites makes you stronger. You can beat others easily in a melee fight. And you can carry more weight with you.

basic.name: Waiter/Waitress
basic.description: Serving so many coffees and burgers makes your move more accurate. You are more likely to hit the target in a fight.

basic.name: Office Worker
basic.description: Comparing to endless overtime work, survive in the wild is not that exhausting for you. You have better stamina than others.

basic.name: Salesman
basic.description: It is a talent for you to easily make conversation with anyone. People tend to like you, and you get advantages on both purchase and sale items.

basic.name: Programmer
basic.description: You gotta be smart and well educated to be a good programmer. You learn things faster than others. And you have a better understanding of high tech stuff.

basic.name: Basketball Player
basic.description: You like playing basketball. Now it pays you back. You move faster than others, you think you can dodge a bullet if you are fast enough.

basic.name: Gambler
basic.description: Fate is a real thing for you. You can sense it with your nose, while other people just think you are so lucky.

advanced.name: Warrior
advanced.description: Warriors performs heavy punch in a close fight.

advanced.name: Swordman
advanced.description: Swordman performs fast attack in a close fight.

advanced.name: Hunter
advanced.description: Hunters are rangers who are also good at melee fight.

advanced.name: Sniper
advanced.description: Snipers are vulnerable in melee fight. But they are very deadly in distance.

advanced.name: Knight
advanced.description: Knight protects others with his shield and faith.

advanced.name: Bodybuilder
advanced.description: Bodybuilder protects others with his body and fist.

advanced.name: Speaker
advanced.description: Speakers can talk people into something with no effort.

advanced.name: Leader
advanced.description: A Team Leader need to be charm and smart.

advanced.name: nerd
advanced.description: Just shut up and let me do my job!

advanced.name: Fighter
advanced.description: Fighter performs good in close fight with light weapons.

advanced.name: Thief
advanced.description: Thief move fast and attack fast. But they cannot take too much damage.
